actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title 26 of the United States Code for the purpose of designating certain electric weapons as destructive devices.

summary.text: Redefines "firearm" under the National Firearms Act to include specified electric weapons for the purpose of sale, manufacture, importation, transportation, and taxation of such weapons.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 26 of the United States Code for the purpose of designating certain electric weapons as destructive devices.
